segments.text: Chandler, we still haven't gotten an RSVP from your dad.
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Oh! Right. Umm, maybe that's because I didn't send him an invitation.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Chandler! He's your father.  he should be at the wedding.
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: I don't even know the man. Okay? We're not that close. I haven't seen him in years.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Well what are you gonna do when he finds out he wasn't even asked?!
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: It's not like we run in the same circles.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: I hang out with you guys, and he stars in a drag show in Vegas.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Ooh, I think I wanna trade circles.
segments.speaker: Phoebe

segments.text: Nobody is gonna be staring at the bride when the father of the groom is wearing a back-less dress.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: So what! As long as he's not wearing a white dress and a veil I don't care.
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Okay, I think I need to do some shopping.
segments.speaker: Phoebe
